message.content:
Here is a simple seven day meal plan that adheres to your restrictions. Please note that portion sizes may need to be adjusted according to personal preferences and caloric intake needs. 

**Day 1**
*Breakfast:* Oatmeal with almond butter, banana slices, and honey. 
*Snack:* A handful of cashews and a green apple.
*Lunch:* Hummus and vegetable sandwich (tomato, cucumber, bell peppers) with side of carrot sticks.
*Dinner:* Grilled chicken with roasted vegetables (zucchini, squash, onion). 

**Day 2**
*Breakfast:* Scrambled tofu with spinach and tomato, whole wheat toast.
*Snack:* A handful of pistachios and a pear.
*Lunch:* Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini), feta cheese (sub for cashew cheese if you like), and lemon dressing. 
*Dinner:* Baked salmon with asparagus and sweet potato.

**Day 3**
*Breakfast:* Avocado toast on whole wheat bread with a poached egg.
*Snack:* A handful of almonds and an orange.
*Lunch:* Lentil soup with side of garlic bread (without butter).
*Dinner:* Beef stir fry with mixed vegetables and brown rice. 

**Day 4**
*Breakfast:* Smoothie made with frozen berries, banana, almond milk, almond butter, and honey.
*Snack:* A handful of cashews and an apple slice.
*Lunch:* Turkey and cheese wrap (without yogurt) with side of cherry tomatoes.
*Dinner:* Chicken curry with basmati rice. 

**Day 5**
*Breakfast:* Greek-style cashew cheese with whole grain crackers, strawberries, and honey.
*Snack:* A handful of pistachios and a kiwi fruit.
*Lunch:* Tuna salad (without yogurt) with mixed greens and cherry tomatoes.
*Dinner:* Grilled shrimp skewers with quinoa and asparagus. 

**Day 6**
*Breakfast:* Peanut butter and jelly sandwich on whole wheat bread with a hard-boiled egg.
*Snack:* A handful of cashews and an apricot.
*Lunch:* Black bean burrito without the yogurt-based topping, served with salsa, guacamole, and brown rice.
*Dinner:* Baked chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and Brussels sprouts. 

**Day 7**
*Breakfast:* Blueberry pancakes made with almond milk instead of regular milk, topped with maple syrup and a handful of cashews.
*Snack:* A handful of pistachios and a pear.
*Lunch:* Tuna salad (without yogurt) with mixed greens and cherry tomatoes on whole wheat bread.
*Dinner:* Beef tacos without the dairy cheese, served with salsa, guacamole, and brown rice. 

Please make sure to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust your intake of salt, sugar and fats according to health recommendations. Always remember to consult a nutritionist or doctor before starting any new diet regimes.
